query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_files, SUM(fileSize) as total_bytes FROM assets; SELECT categoryId, COUNT(*) as file_count, SUM(fileSize) as category_bytes FROM assets GROUP BY categoryId ORDER BY categoryId;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2GX11Pnc2Gj5TH4.ab1ece9ffb5d --database kUQZAex2uPvgKcHnt7bmh3 --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total_files, SUM(fileSize) as total_bytes FROM assets; SELECT categoryId, COUNT(*) as file_count, SUM(fileSize) as category_bytes FROM assets GROUP BY categoryId ORDER BY categoryId;
